Package com.behreajj.camzup.core

Class Arrange3

java.lang.Object
com.behreajj.camzup.core.Arrange3
public abstract class Arrange3 extends Object
Provides methods to align and distribute 3D entities.

  • Method Details

    • alignBack

      public static void alignBack(Bounds3 b, MeshEntity3[] mes)
      Aligns all mesh entities in the array to the back edge of a bounds.
      Parameters:
      b - the bounds
      mes - the mesh entities

    • alignBack

      public static void alignBack(Bounds3 b, MeshEntity3[] mes, int sign, float fac)
      Aligns all mesh entities in the array to the back edge of a bounds. The sign indicates whether to align inside the edge (1), on the edge (0) or outside the edge (-1).
      Parameters:
      b - the bounds
      mes - the mesh entities
      sign - the alignment sign
      fac - the factor

    • alignBottom

    • alignX

      public static void alignX(Bounds3 b, MeshEntity3[] mes, int sign, float fac)
      Aligns all mesh entities in the array to the x axis center of the bounds. The sign indicates whether to align to the right of the edge (1), on the edge (0) or to the left of the edge (-1).
      Parameters:
      b - the bounds
      mes - the mesh entities
      sign - the alignment sign
      fac - the factor

      public static void alignY(Bounds3 b, MeshEntity3[] mes, int sign, float fac)
      Aligns all mesh entities in the array to the y axis center of the bounds. The sign indicates whether to align above the edge (1), on the edge (0) or to below the edge (-1).
      Parameters:
      b - the bounds
      mes - the mesh entities
      sign - the alignment sign
      fac - the factor

      Distributes all mesh entities in the array horizontally within a bounds.
      Parameters:
      b - the bounds
      mes - the mesh entities

    • distributeX

      public static void distributeX(Bounds3 b, MeshEntity3[] mes, int sign, float fac)
      Distributes all mesh entities in the array horizontally within a bounds. The sign indicates whether to align inside the edge (1), on the edge (0) or to outside the edge (-1).

      Creates a sorted copy of the input array.
      Parameters:
      b - the bounds
      mes - the mesh entities
      sign - the alignment sign
      fac - the factor

    • distributeY

      public static void distributeY(Bounds3 b, MeshEntity3[] mes)

      Parameters:
      b - the bounds
      mes - the mesh entities

    • distributeY

      public static void distributeY(Bounds3 b, MeshEntity3[] mes, int sign, float fac)
      Distributes all mesh entities in the array on the depth axis within a bounds. The sign indicates whether to align inside the edge (1), on the edge (0) or to outside the edge (-1).

      Creates a sorted copy of the input array.
      Parameters:
      b - the bounds
      mes - the mesh entities
      sign - the alignment sign
      fac - the factor
